seo.title: Insurance & Payment - Unita Hospital
seo.description: Unita Hospital accepts Hygeia HMO, AIICO Health, Clearline HMO, and Reliance Health insurance. Learn about payment options and coverage.

intro: Unita Hospital partners with leading health maintenance organizations (HMOs) to ensure affordable, accessible healthcare for our patients. Check if your insurance provider is accepted below.

providers.name: Clearline HMO

providers.name: Reliance Health (Alafia)
providers.description: Modern health insurance with easy digital access and comprehensive benefits.
